name: Game Maker 3D Model File
summary: 3D model created by Model Creator for Game Maker, a program used for designing 3D models; uses the same formatting as a GameMaker .D3D file but has a different file extension; saved in a plain text format and specifies the three-dimensional structure of the model, including vertices and shapes; used for rendering 3D objects in Game Maker games.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
